dynamic_line: As you approach you feel compelled to touch the creature encased in glass the corpse inside is screaming, it needs your help.

A almost human voice errupts in your mind:
"FREE ME!"

With a terrible shriek the mercenary falls off the spike and begins to move.  It stares right at you before vanishing.  In the distance you can hear a radio squelch:
"Target aquired.  Falling back, regroup and prepare to attack the intruder."

responses.text: You can here the rushing of boots all around you, and the chattering of radios.  It must still be close and you are their target.
